landing.bio: I am a computer engineering student studying in School Of Engineering, central campus of Pokhara University situated in Pokhara Valley, Nepal. I am an Android developer and mostly work with Flutter and Firebase. I have completed some flutter projects which can be found in my github account. As well as, I am doing some projects on Python.

experience.aboutWork: Advertisement of the company in digital world.
Basically conducting workshop and Tech-discussion on some interesting platform for students on Campus.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a android developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors and like to play guitar on some occasion.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the back-end web or android development world.
